Item.Name: Remote Sensor Management capabilities
Item.Description: Specifies the capabilities supported by the device to manage and store remote sensors information retrieved from the sensor group as a Bit Mask: Bit 0: Dynamic mapping support - Remote sensors can be discovered as new messages are received. If explicit mapping is required, new corresponding object instances will be automatically created Bit 1: Implicit mapping support - Sensor state is maintained on an implementation specific internal database instead of being reflected into local objects Bit 2: Auto clear support – Automatic clear to the default value is supported after validity time is expired

Item.Name: Max number of explicit sensors
Item.Description: The maximum number of sensors and sensor states the device can instantiate. This value is calculated by the count of all different sensor objects associated with a sensor groups. This value shall be set to 0 if explicit mapping is not supported On uCiFi compliant devices support for static explicit mapping is mandatory.

Item.Name: Max number of implicit sensors
Item.Description: The maximum number of sensors and sensor states the device can keep in memory. This value is calculated by the count of all different sensor objects associated with a sensor groups. This value shall be set to 0 if implicit mapping is not supported.

Item.Name: Data Fusion Capabilities
Item.Description: Specifies the data fusion algorithms supported by the device represented as a bitmask: Bit 0: OR Bit 1: AND Bit 2: ADD Bit 3: MAX Bit 4: MIN Bit 5: LAST – The last value reported by any sensor in the group becomes the group state value Bit 6: Reserved (Custom 1) Bit 7: Reserved (Custom 2) If the device supports no fusion capabilities, this resource should be set to 0.

Item.Name: Reset DSG objects
Item.Description: When executed, trigger a complete wipe of the distributed sensor groups already commissioned
